description: Details required by Condition 3 (Construction Logistics Plan), Condition 4 (Sample of Facing Material), Condition 11 (Sustainable Drainage Strategy), Condition 13 (Secure Cycle Parking), Condition 14 (Waste and Recycling), Condition 17 (Carport) and Condition 23 (Basement Impact Assessment  Hydrological Survey) of Planning Permission 19/01218/FUL (Demolition of existing properties and redevelopment of the site providing 6x detached dwellings (4x 5 bed and 2x 3 bed units) with associated garages/car ports, parking, internal access road and associated landscaping)
